channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Snap Deploy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Snap Deploy

item.title: CVE-2022-30696|2024-08-03T06:56:13.592Z -- acronis -- acronis%20snap%20deploy
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to a DLL hijacking vulnerability. The following products are affected: Acronis Snap Deploy (Windows) before build 3640

item.title: CVE-2022-30697|2024-08-03T06:56:13.804Z -- acronis -- acronis%20snap%20deploy
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to insecure folder permissions. The following products are affected: Acronis Snap Deploy (Windows) before build 3640

item.title: CVE-2022-30695|2024-08-03T06:56:13.502Z -- acronis -- acronis%20snap%20deploy
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to excessive permissions assigned to child processes. The following products are affected: Acronis Snap Deploy (Windows) before build 3640
